verses.verse: Judge <WH8199> <WH8798> me, O 'Elohim <WH430>, and plead <WH7378> <WH8798> my cause <WH7379> against an ungodly <WH3808> <WH2623> nation <WH1471>: O deliver <WH6403> <WH8762> me from the deceitful <WH4820> and unjust <WH5766> man <WH376>.

For thou art the 'Elohim <WH430> of my strength <WH4581>: why dost thou cast me off <WH2186> <WH8804>? why go <WH1980> <WH8691> I mourning <WH6937> <WH8802> because of the oppression <WH3906> of the enemy <WH341> <WH8802> ?

O send out <WH7971> <WH8798> thy light <WH216> and thy truth <WH571>: let them lead <WH5148> <WH8686> me; let them bring <WH935> <WH8686> me unto thy holy <WH6944> hill <WH2022>, and to thy tabernacles <WH4908>.

Then will I go <WH935> <WH8799> unto the altar <WH4196> of 'Elohim <WH430>, unto 'Elohim <WH410> my exceeding <WH8057> joy <WH1524>: yea, upon the harp <WH3658> will I praise <WH3034> <WH8686> thee, O 'Elohim <WH430> my 'Elohim <WH430>.

Why art thou cast down <WH7817> <WH8709>, O my soul <WH5315>? and why art thou disquieted <WH1993> <WH8799> within me? hope <WH3176> <WH8685> in 'Elohim <WH430>: for I shall yet praise <WH3034> <WH8686> him, who is the health <WH3444> of my countenance <WH6440>, and my 'Elohim <WH430>.
